languages.text: {n}Оружие в ваших руках начинает ослепительно светиться. Ваша праведная атака разрывает Риззу на атомы, не дав ей времени даже на предсмертное проклятье.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Оружие в ваших руках начинает ослепительно светиться. Ваша праведная атака разрывает Риззу на атомы, не дав ей времени даже на предсмертное проклятье.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Оружие в ваших руках начинает ослепительно светиться. Ваша праведная атака разрывает Риззу на атомы, не дав ей времени даже на предсмертное проклятье.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to say her last curse.{/n}
{n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to say her last curse.{/n}

{n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}
{n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你手中的武器发出了耀眼的光芒。莱萨还没来得及说出最后的诅咒，就被你碾成了飞灰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你手中的武器发出了耀眼的光芒。莱萨还没来得及说出最后的诅咒，就被你碾成了飞灰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}手にした武器が光りだす。最期の呪いを口にする間もなく、リザはあなたの聖なる攻撃により粉末と化した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手にした武器が光りだす。最期の呪いを口にする間もなく、リザはあなたの聖なる攻撃により粉末と化した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El arma de tus manos comienza a brillar de forma cegadora. Tu ataque sagrado pulveriza a Ryzza antes de que tenga tiempo de pronunciar su última maldición.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El arma de tus manos comienza a brillar de forma cegadora. Tu ataque sagrado pulveriza a Ryzza antes de que tenga tiempo de pronunciar su última maldición.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Waffe in deinen Händen beginnt gleißend hell zu leuchten. Dein heiliger Angriff atomisiert Ryzza, bevor sie Zeit hat, ihren letzten Fluch auszusprechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Waffe in deinen Händen beginnt gleißend hell zu leuchten. Dein heiliger Angriff atomisiert Ryzza, bevor sie Zeit hat, ihren letzten Fluch auszusprechen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une lueur aveuglante émane de l'arme que vous tenez. Votre attaque sacrée atomise Ryzza avant même qu'elle n'ait le temps de proférer une dernière imprécation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur aveuglante émane de l'arme que vous tenez. Votre attaque sacrée atomise Ryzza avant même qu'elle n'ait le temps de proférer une dernière imprécation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ellerindeki silah, kör edici bir ışıkla parlamaya başlıyor. Kutsal saldırın, Ryzza son bir lanet daha okuyamadan önce onu atomlarına ayırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weapon in your hands starts glowing blindingly. Your holy attack atomises Ryzza before she has time to utter her last curse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ellerindeki silah kör edici bir ışıkla parlamaya başlıyor. Kutsal saldırın, Ryzza daha son bir lanet sarf edemeden önce onu atomlarına ayırıyor.{/n}
